root: ^When you finally defeat the lock on the Ordinary-Looking Door, you see just a glimpse of bookshelves - more bookshelves than you have ever seen before, rows and rows of them disappearing into the shadows of a cavernous room - before a vicious wind seizes you. You squeeze your eyes shut.
^Then, you are flung forward by something more powerful than you can understand.

intro_knot_1: ^When you come to, you find yourself in a strange room. Not the one you saw before. A smaller one, but still packed floor to ceiling with books.
